general.description: Milspec is most well known for producing the most advanced systems cores known, with these premium pieces of technology providing dedicated service, power, and protection. Their Orion series systems cores are overturned to provide a strong balance between defense and power generation, making them the premier combat system used by the elite of House Sirius. Fitted on the Dogma flagship, the 9901 is end-all for extended combat operations, featuring a balanced approach to defense and offense to last the most heavily-armed cruisers through battle.
